Subclasses of DbManager in ca.ualberta.cmput301w13t11.FoodBook.model
 class IngredientsDbManager
          Implements the functionality required to manage the Ingredients database, which is the User maintained database of ingredients meant to reflect the contents of their kitchen.
 class RecipesDbManager
          Implements the functionality required to manage the table of Recipes for the application.
 class ResultsDbManager
          Implements the functionality required to manage the Results database, which stores the results of the latest search query.
